page.title: 16FARMING 50 YEARS AGO.
page.content: I used to get up when my Dad called me at 6 o'clock in the morning. My first job was to take my Dad and Mum a cup of tea in bed .I then used to get my two horses from the field into the stable where I fed and groomed them. I would have my breakfast at 7.30 a.m. I left the milking for my brother, who had to hand milk two cows. I would harness up the horses. I would lead the horses into the field which I was going to plough. I hitched the horses up to the plough and I ploughed the field until dinner time when I took the horses in for their mid-day feed, mean while having my own dinner. After dinner my father said we would sow the field of corn . I took the seed corn to the field in the cart. My Father started sowing the corn by hand from a seed lip which he carried on his arm.
